import React, { useRef, Fragment } from 'react'; import { Footer } from './Footer.jsx'; import { asyncTimeout } from '../../../client/scripts/helpers.js'; export const Navbar = () => { const active = 'mobile-nav--active'; const fadeIn = 'animate__fadeIn'; const fadeOut = 'animate__fadeout'; let ref = useRef(null); const toggleMenu = async function (event) { event.preventDefault(); const target = ref.current; // if (target.className.indexOf(active) > -1) { // target.classList.add(fadeOut); // await asyncTimeout(500); // target.classList.remove(fadeIn, fadeOut, active); // return; // } target.classList.add(active); await asyncTimeout(500); console.log('HI'); target.classList.add(fadeIn); }; return (
toggleMenu(event)}>
  • Events
  • Leagues
  • Parks
  • Atheletes
{/* Mobile Menu */}
{/* User Buttons */}
toggleMenu(event)} >
{/* Search */}

 ); };
